StreamClientProducer.​CommandConsumer
StreamClientProducer.​CommandConsumer

This class provides the IPC functionality by subscribing to the COMMANDS topic on the Kafka server

Constants
Kafka Connection Information
server

The server information

topic

The Kafak topic to subscribe to

Variables
Active
private bool Active

Manages the main loop in CommandThread

controller
ThreadController controller

The ThreadController that instanciated this obj.  Access is necesary to allow IPC commands to propagate through this Application

config
ConsumerConfig config

The configuration for the Kafka client

Cancellation
canceltoken

a taken passed to the Kafka client

source

the source for canceltoken

blacklist
HashSet<string> blacklist

a list of users to ignore messages from, passed in from THreadController

Functions
CommandConsumer
public CommandConsumer(
ThreadController controller,
ref HashSet<string> blacklist
)

The constructor for CommandConsumer Generates the configuraiton for the Kafka client.

Parameters
controller
ThreadController

the <ThreadConstroller> that created this object

blacklist
ref HashSet<string>

a refrence to the shared blacklist object owned by <ThreadConstroller>

CommandThread
public void CommandThread()

The main loop to be run as a thread. Generates a Kafka client that checks for new messages COMMANDS and then calls the appropriete function from THreadController

Variables
Kafka Client
consumer

the Kafka consumer that will connect to the Kafka server

topicp

what partition to start looking for messages in.

Commad Strings
input

the raw message

command

the part of the message that specifies what function to exicute

parameter

the part of a message that may be passed into a function at exicution

Functions
Kill
public void Kill()

Ends the primary loop and allows the thread to end.
